abstract: Terrorist attacks in Paris are expected to affect the Boston Marathon bombing trial of Dzhokhar Tsarnaev; analysts say selection of impartial jury could be extremely difficult.
lead_paragraph: A grim reminder of a global struggle adds to the challenge of selecting a jury for Dzhokhar Tsarnaev, the defendant in the 2013 Boston Marathon bombing, analysts said.
snippet: A grim reminder of a global struggle adds to the challenge of selecting a jury for Dzhokhar Tsarnaev, the defendant in the 2013 Boston Marathon bombing, analysts said.

headline.main: Paris Attacks Expected to Influence Boston Trial
headline.print_headline: Paris Attacks Expected to Influence Boston Trial
